input: How do I register for GST?
output:
GST registration process:

1. **Eligibility**: Mandatory if turnover > ₹40 lakhs (₹20 lakhs for special states)

2. **Required Documents**:
   • PAN card
   • Aadhaar card
   • Business registration certificate
   • Bank account details
   • Digital signature (for companies)

3. **Process**:
   • Visit GST portal (gst.gov.in)
   • Fill Form GST REG-01
   • Upload documents
   • Pay application fee
   • Receive GSTIN in 3-7 days

InvoNest provides GST-compliant invoice templates once you're registered!
